nodes.text: A clone trooper commander served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars.

Around 21 BBY, he was alongside High Jedi Generals Obi-Wan Kenobi and Mace Windu, and Clone Marshal Commander Cody, aboard a LAAT/i en-route to a repair mission of a critically damaged hypermatter refinery within Republic space. However, when the bounty hunter Volan Das led an attack on another Republic hypermatter refinery, the group received a distress call from the engineers aboard the facility. The LAAT/i then changed its course and headed to the refinery's location, a few parsecs away, to stop the attack.

Upon arriving aboard the facility, the clone commander fought Separatist battle droids while the Jedi Masters tried to find a way to capture the Iktotchi bounty hunter. After Das was tracked and detained by the two Jedi and Cody, the clone commander arrived to inform them that the Vulture droid starfighters attacking the facility had also been destroyed.

The clone commander wore a Phase II clone trooper armor with a pauldron and a kama, as well as macrobinoculars as a helmet attachment. His quick-release holster held two DC-17 hand blasters, and he also carried a DC-15A blaster rifle.
